attributes.action: immediately withdraw all support for US international operations in the face of the Obama adminstration's stance on the Falklands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK has consisently been a stalwart supporter of the United States, including recently in Iraq and Afghanistan, paying for that support with the lives of our brave servicemen. 

In return, Obama has chosen to support Argentina on its completely unfounded claim to the Falklands, and undermined the democratic priniciples the US purports to uphold by entirely ignoring the Falkland Island's right to self-determination

This is a disgusting betrayal of the UK and the Falkland Islanders. If this is how the US treats its greatest allies then it is better not to be one at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
